base_description: Black rectangular remote with colorful buttons.
part_description: Includes a circular button, multiple rows of small buttons, and colored buttons in the center. Positioned on the front face.
internal_interaction_description: The circular button likely controls navigation, while the small buttons perform specific functions. Colored buttons may provide quick access to specific features, interacting with internal circuits to send signals.
external_interaction_description: Interacts with electronic devices like TVs or stereos, sending infrared signals when buttons are pressed. Users can control device functions remotely, such as changing channels or adjusting volume.
